short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let us help you search on the site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OLX Assistant v1.2
 - Quick fixes after site update
OLX Assistant v1.1
Current website support in the following countries:
Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Bulgaria. 

Updated automatic version of the application.
It will help you in the search on the site. The following functions are available:
- Hide TOP ads
- Display only the search query
- Automatic loading of new products without going to a new page.
